data.actual_result: You can create a new line within the search bar (the text seems to disappear but when you press delete key the text is back)
data.expected_result: It should either submit search or not work at all according to another bug I reported before
data.short_description: New Search bar field allows you to write multiple lines
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel - Tap Search. You can also use the search bar in Quick switcher  - Tap Enter key on your keyboard
